title: Disadvantage of Using Biomass for Energy

content.question: Which of the following negative consequences is most often associated with using biomass for energy production?

choices.label: Using biomass for energy production requires long-term storage for radioactive waste.
Using biomass for energy production can increase salinization in agricultural fields.
Using biomass for energy production releases carbon sequestered in fossil fuels into the atmosphere.
Using biomass for energy production can result in local deforestation.

content.answer: Using biomass for energy production can result in local deforestation.

skill.text: Skill 7.C: Describe disadvantages, advantages, or unintended consequences for potential solutions.
